mapper.insert: insert into wishlist(wish_num, image, id, pro_num, pro_info, price, price_point, delivery, delivery_cost) values(wish_seq.nextval,#{image}, #{id}, #{pro_num}, #{pro_info}, #{price}, #{price_point}, #{delivery}, #{delivery_cost})
mapper.select: select * from wishlist where id=#{id} order by wish_num desc
